section.title: ResourcePoolSetTag
section.para: ResourcePoolSetTag applies a tag to a resource pool. It identifies the tag through a tag category and name.

formalpara.title: Examples
formalpara.para: The following examples demonstrate ResourcePoolSetTag usage:

example.title: ResourcePoolSetTag WSDL
example.programlisting: <message name="ResourcePoolSetTag"> <part name="resourcepoolId" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="category" type="xsd:string"/> <part name="name" type="xsd:string"/> </message> <message name="ResourcePoolSetTagResponse"> <part name="return" type="xsd:boolean"/> </message>
